title: Masteries
body:
Hi there,

I see now we can drag up and down the order of our rune pages, which is awesome!! and a very helpful improvement, I was wondering can you do the same for masteries as I tried to drag it up and down to no avail.

Look forward to your response

{{champion:3}}

replies.body:
Yeap you can do the same for masteries :D

https://media.giphy.com/media/3oKIPhJKDxNBebEH3G/giphy.gif

Also bit of a minor point but watch the board you post content in next time. This isn't really a "player creation", it's probably more suited for the Miscellaneous or Help & Support boards.

Yea i wasnt sure what category to put it in.

Also i tried to do that (move the masteries up and down) and it comes up with a circle with a diagonal cross through it, indicating this is not an option ?
That's super weird lol... Are you using mac? And have you tried repairing the client?

Just FYI the whole masteries system and runes are being reworked for next season atm so I doubt they'd make too many changes to the current system here is a link if you want to have a look:
http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/coming-preseason-runes-reforged
